org.daisy.streamline.api.tasks

Class TaskSystemFactoryMaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.streamline.api.tasks.TaskSystemFactoryMaker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskSystemFactoryMakerService

    public class TaskSystemFactoryMaker
extends java.lang.Object
implements TaskSystemFactoryMakerService
    Entry point for retrieving a TaskSystem implementation. This class will locate all TaskSystemFactory implementations available to the java services API.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskSystemFactoryMaker()
      Creates a new task system factory maker.

      • newInstance

        public static TaskSystemFactoryMaker newInstance()

        Creates a new TaskSystemFactoryMaker and populates it using the SPI (java service provider interface).

        In an OSGi context, an instance should be retrieved using the service registry. It will be registered under the TaskSystemFactoryMakerService interface.

        Returns:
        returns a new TaskSystemFactoryMaker

                                    java.lang.String outputFormat,
                                    java.lang.String locale)
                             throws TaskSystemFactoryException
        Description copied from interface: TaskSystemFactoryMakerService
        Gets a TaskSystemFactory that supports the specified locale and format.
        Specified by:
        getFactory in interface TaskSystemFactoryMakerService
        Parameters:
        inputFormat - the input file format
        outputFormat - the output file format
        locale - the target locale

        Throws:
